mdRecord.dcterms:title: Official map of Washington: Fifteenth International Christian Endeavor Convention, July 8-13, 1896 / prepared by the Committee of '96 ; presented with the compliments of the Estey Organ and Piano Co., Brattleboro, Vermont, and New York, N.Y.
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: International Christian Endeavor Convention (15th : 1896 : Washington, D.C.)
United Society of Christian Endeavor. Committee of '96.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows street railways and radial distances from the Ellipse.
"Copyright, 1896, by Anson S. Taylor and Wm. B. Robison, Trustees."
Includes text, colored illustrations, and index to points of interest including main meeting places, churches, hotels, monuments and statues, parks, cemeteries, and more.
Index to points of interest and blank area on verso.
Map shows street names and is divided into quadrants.
Table under title: "Location of street railways and transfer station."
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS. Imperfect: has marginal tears, and a taped repair on verso.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington (D.C.)--Maps
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
